00009 #include "TTLowpassButterworth.h"

00011 
00012 TTLowpassButterworth::TTLowpassButterworth(TTUInt8 newMaxNumChannels)
00013         : TTAudioObject::TTAudioObject(newMaxNumChannels),
00014         xm1(NULL), xm2(NULL), ym1(NULL), ym2(NULL)
00015 {
00016         // register parameters
00017         registerParameter(TT("frequency"),      kTypeInt32,             &attrFrequency, (TTGetterMethod)NULL, (TTSetterMethod)&TTLowpassButterworth::setFrequency);
00018 
00019         // register for notifications from the parent class so we can allocate memory as required
00020         registerMessage(TT("updateMaxNumChannels"), (TTMethod)&TTLowpassButterworth::updateMaxNumChannels);
00021         // make the clear method available to the outside world
00022         registerMessage(TT("clear"), (TTMethod)&TTLowpassButterworth::clear);
00023 
00024         // Set Defaults...
00025         setParameterValue(TT("maxNumChannels"), newMaxNumChannels);                     // This parameter is inherited
00026         setParameterValue(TT("frequency"),              4000.0);
00027         setProcess((TTProcessMethod)&TTLowpassButterworth::processAudio);
00028 }
00029 
00030 
00031 TTLowpassButterworth::~TTLowpassButterworth()
00032 {
00033         free(xm1);
00034         free(xm2);
00035         free(ym1);
00036         free(ym2);
00037 }
00038 
00039 
00040 TTErr TTLowpassButterworth::updateMaxNumChannels()
00041 {
00042         if(xm1)
00043                 free(xm1);
00044         if(xm2)
00045                 free(xm2);
00046         if(ym1)
00047                 free(ym1);
00048         if(ym2)
00049                 free(ym2);
00050         
00051         xm1 = (TTFloat64*)malloc(sizeof(TTFloat64) * maxNumChannels);
00052         xm2 = (TTFloat64*)malloc(sizeof(TTFloat64) * maxNumChannels);
00053         ym1 = (TTFloat64*)malloc(sizeof(TTFloat64) * maxNumChannels);
00054         ym2 = (TTFloat64*)malloc(sizeof(TTFloat64) * maxNumChannels);
00055         
00056         clear();
00057         return kTTErrNone;
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 TTErr TTLowpassButterworth::clear()
00062 {
00063         short i;
00064 
00065         for(i=0; i<maxNumChannels; i++){
00066                 xm1[i] = 0.0;
00067                 xm2[i] = 0.0;
00068                 ym1[i] = 0.0;
00069                 ym2[i] = 0.0;
00070         }
00071         return kTTErrNone;
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 TTErr TTLowpassButterworth::setFrequency(TTValue& newValue)
00076 {
00077         attrFrequency = newValue;
00078         c = 1 / ( tan( kTTPi*(attrFrequency/sr) ) );
00079         a0 = 1 / (1 + kTTSqrt2*c + c*c);
00080         a1 = 2*a0;
00081         a2 = a0;
00082         b1 = 2*a0*( 1 - c*c );
00083         b2 = a0 * (1 - kTTSqrt2*c + c*c);
00084         return kTTErrNone;
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 TTErr TTLowpassButterworth::processAudio(TTAudioSignal& in, TTAudioSignal& out)
00089 {
00090         short                   vs;
00091         TTSampleValue   *inSample,
00092                                         *outSample;
00093         TTFloat64               tempx,
00094                                         tempy;
00095         short                   numchannels = TTAudioSignal::getMinChannelCount(in, out);
00096         short                   channel;
00097 
00098         // This outside loop works through each channel one at a time
00099         for(channel=0; channel<numchannels; channel++){
00100                 inSample = in.sampleVectors[channel];
00101                 outSample = out.sampleVectors[channel];
00102                 vs = in.vs;
00103                 
00104                 // This inner loop works through each sample within the channel one at a time
00105                 while(vs--){
00106                         tempx = *inSample++;
00107                         tempy = antiDenormal(a0*tempx + a1*xm1[channel] + a2*xm2[channel] - b1*ym1[channel] - b2*ym2[channel]);
00108                         xm2[channel] = xm1[channel];
00109                         xm1[channel] = tempx;
00110                         ym2[channel] = ym1[channel];
00111                         ym1[channel] = tempy;
00112                         *outSample++ = tempy;
00113                 }
00114         }
00115         return kTTErrNone;
00116 }
